## TextCanvas.getLayer() method

Retrieves a specific `TextCanvas` rendering layer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLayer(layerId: number): TextCanvasLayer | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  layerId | number | Desired layer identifier. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TextCanvasLayer](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvaslayer.md) \| undefined

Selected \[\[TextCanvasLayer\]\].
